mil3.3.8:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, do contact and also feeling arise where mind consciousness arises?”
mil3.3.8:1.3: “Yes, your majesty, where mind consciousness arises, there too contact, feeling, perception, intention, applied thought, and examination arise, and all mental states that arise there are led by contact.”
mil3.3.8:7.1: Distinguishing Characteristic of Contact Question eighth
